function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social interaction due to COVID-19","Impact":"Loneliness, reduced productivity, unhealthy habits, loss of human interactions","Mitigation":"Provide outdoor and indoor communal living spaces, support physical distancing, improve indoor air quality and thermal comfort","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, outdoor furniture, lighting designs","People":"Residents of high-rise residential buildings","Owner":"Building management or administrators"}]}
